bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to [s.n.] Perry, May 13, 1919

div1.p: Carter sends Perry suggestions for the Surgeon General on the administrative policy of the US Public Health Service, in regard to junior officers.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to [s.n.] Perry, May 13, 1919
div1.opener:
Copy.
New Orleans, La.
May 13, 1919.
Dear Perry:
div1.p:
In addition to the suggestions on the Regulations, I feel much
like presenting this one--unasked for--on the administrative po-
licy of the Service. Would you give it to the Service Board?
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, (Signed) H. R. Carter
Assistant Surgeon General. HRC-CL
Memorandum enclosed.
